use_cases_desc: transitions between nomadic and stationary work contexts; activity-aware devices; activity-based computing
contribution_desc: A work-in-progress paper on using the tabletop as a multi-device activity-configuration space (which leads to ActivitySpace). A technical infrastructure for supporting ad hoc multi-device configuration work and resource management for knowledge workers. An interactive desk as a mediating device that enables seamless transitions with device ecologies between nomadic and stationary work contexts.
tracking_characteristic: Tracking devices only; Location 2D; Identity; Outside-in tracking
connection_classification: Local master device; Via remote server
contribution: Toolkit, middleware; Study, deployment; participatory design workshop
crossdevice_def:
Reconfiguration: "(i) finding the relevant documents and launching the correct application while moving or distributing work between one device to another device, (ii) dealing with interruptions generated by the different devices in use and, (iii) updating the settings of a device."

Configuration work: "The amount of work required to set up an environment so it enables the user to perform a task or activity. It is the effort required to
control, manage and understand information, applications and services that are distributed over all used devices."
